name: Space Bullets 5
description:
This is a bullet hell experiment where I learned various particle, shader and controller techniques.

The game can be controlled with a game-pad (PS4 tested) or keyboard/mouse.

Game-Pad Controls:

left stick - move; right stick - look; right trigger - fire; left/right bumpers - change dimensions!

Keyboard/Mouse:

WASD - move; Mouse - look; Left Mouse Button - fire; Q/E - change dimensions!
